record.description: Frederic Woodward, vice-president of the University of Chicago presents the James Nelson Raymond Law scholarships for $600 to the award's first winners. Recipients, left to right: Carl N. Howig, Gerhardt S. Jersild, and William Klevs, and Frederic Woodward. Mrs. Anna L. Raymond established the scholarship as a memorial to her late husband.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
